title: Competitions, hackathons, and job opportunities
content:
# Unstop App Guide

## Navigation
- **Home Grid**: The main screen features large icons for key sections like **Internships**, **Jobs**, **Competitions**, **Mock Tests**, and **Mentorships**.
- **Side Menu**: Tap the **Hamburger icon** (top-left) to access the full menu, including **"100 Days to Code"**, **Courses**, and your user dashboards (**My Activity**, **Recruiter/Organizer**).
- **Bottom Tabs**: Access your personal activity via tabs like **Registrations**, **Watchlist**, and **Recently Viewed** at the bottom of the screen.

## Search
- **Opportunity Search**: Use the main bar labeled **"Search Opportunities"** to find specific events or roles.
- **Explore Categories**: The search screen provides quick-access circles for specific interests like **Hackathons**, **Quizzes**, **Cultural Events**, **Scholarships**, and **Workshops**.
- **Filters**: On listing pages (e.g., Hackathons), use the bottom bar to filter by **Team Size**, **Payment** (Free/Paid), or **Categories**.

## Common Actions
- **Register/Apply**: Tap on an opportunity card (e.g., "Alphabyte 3.0") to view details and tap the register button. Cards display **Deadlines** ("7 days left"), **Fee** ("â‚¹ 399"), and **Team Size** ("2-4 Members").
- **Host Events**: Tap the large **"+ Host"** button in the side menu to list your own competition or job opening.
- **Switch Categories**: Use the pill-shaped tabs at the top of listing screens to quickly toggle between **Internships**, **Jobs**, **Competitions**, etc..

## Tips
- **Prize Indicators**: Look for green tags on competition cards (e.g., **"Prizes worth 30,500"**) to identify high-value events.
- **Exclusive Opportunities**: The "Featured" section on the home screen highlights unique events like **"One Day Internship with Ankit"** or huge cash prize hackathons.
- **Registration Count**: You can see popularity before applying, as cards display the number of current registrants (e.g., "38 Registered").
